trans-unit.source: Install StorSimple Adapter for SharePoint | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Install StorSimple Adapter for SharePoint | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Describes how to install the StorSimple Adapter for SharePoint in a SharePoint server farm.
trans-unit.target: Describes how to install the StorSimple Adapter for SharePoint in a SharePoint server farm.

trans-unit.source: To install the StorSimple Adapter for SharePoint
trans-unit.target: To install the StorSimple Adapter for SharePoint

trans-unit.source: Copy the installer to the web front end (WFE) server that is also configured to run the SharePoint Central Administration web application.
trans-unit.target: Copy the installer to the web front end (WFE) server that is also configured to run the SharePoint Central Administration web application.

trans-unit.source: Use an account with administrator privileges to log on to the WFE server.
trans-unit.target: Use an account with administrator privileges to log on to the WFE server.

trans-unit.source: The StorSimple Adapter for SharePoint Setup Wizard starts.
trans-unit.target: The StorSimple Adapter for SharePoint Setup Wizard starts.

trans-unit.source: In the StorSimple Adapter for SharePoint setup configuration page, select an installation location, type the IP address for the DATA 0 network interface on your StorSimple device, and then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: In the StorSimple Adapter for SharePoint setup configuration page, select an installation location, type the IP address for the DATA 0 network interface on your StorSimple device, and then click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: In the setup confirmation page, click **Install**.
trans-unit.target: In the setup confirmation page, click **Install**.

trans-unit.source: Click **Finish** to close the Setup Wizard.
trans-unit.target: Click **Finish** to close the Setup Wizard.

trans-unit.source: Open the SharePoint Central Administration page.
trans-unit.target: Open the SharePoint Central Administration page.

trans-unit.source: You should see a StorSimple Configuration group that contains the StorSimple Adapter for SharePoint links.
trans-unit.target: You should see a StorSimple Configuration group that contains the StorSimple Adapter for SharePoint links.

trans-unit.source: Go to the next step: [Configure RBS](#configure-rbs).
trans-unit.target: Go to the next step: [Configure RBS](#configure-rbs).
